data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Mačvanski to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Mačvanski, Serbia
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Mačvanski to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 2,147 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Mačvanski.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken the sleepers and call them to repent and be baptized in the state of Mačvanski. Set an urgency in their hearts.
data.verse: And now why do you wait? Rise and be baptized and wash away your sins, calling on his name.’

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Adyghe people.
Father, you gave the church of Mačvanski, Serbia the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Mačvanski, Serbia a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.section_summary:
the state of Mačvanski, Serbia has a population of 299,000.

We estimate Mačvanski has 2,147 people who might know Jesus, 234,711 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 62,142 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 139 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, let the threatened of Mačvanski, Serbia know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.
